page.title: 20Musical instrument maker
page.content: {h Robert Hadaway}has lived at{ {Coedmawr, Llangeitho for 11 years. He came from England with his wife and 3 children to live off the land and to make stringed instruments as he had done for the previous 5 years. He makes instruments that were played centuries ago for musicians who wanted to play music of the 16th. and 17th. centuries as it was played then. To do this he must travel all over the world to study those instruments that have survived and are now in museums. He examines them, measures and draws them, takes photographs and, back in Wales in his workshop made from the old barn of the farm, he makes copies of new versions of them, trying to recreate the sounds of the past. Just now he is making a large and beautiful {Welsh triple harp.
